meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Evan Sandman Gina Harris Sunny Stalter Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6236.

td.p: Evan Sandman, a hotel front desk manager from Los Angeles, California
Gina Harris, a document specialist from Aloha, Oregon
Sunny Stalter, an English professor from Auburn, Alabama (whose 2-day cash winnings total $36,200)

tr.td: RICH COUNTRY, POOR COUNTRY
SHOW ME YOUR STUFF
TV PERSONALITIES
HOSPITALS
TEXTING FOR SHORT
SEASHELLS

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'It\'s the world\'s third-biggest economy, with 2010 GDP of $4.3 trillion--that\'s more than 300 trillion yen')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: It's the world's third-biggest economy, with 2010 GDP of $4.3 trillion--that's more than 300 trillion yen

tr.td: Sunny
Gina
Evan
IT'S NOT THE END OF THE WORLD
FALL GUYS
BOOK DEDICATIONS
THE MUSICAL ACT THEY FOLLOW
HALLOWEEN CANDY
"TRICK" OR "TREAT"

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Sunny] You are correct. Frederic March--Frederic March! [Laughs] Karl Marx and--and Friedrich Engels.)
GinaWhat are abolitionists?
$10,100
SunnyWhat is communists?
$14,000
EvanWhat are the Communists?
$6,601
communists')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '"In this sense, the theory of" this group "may be summed up in the single sentence: abolition of private property"')

tr.td: 19th CENTURY QUOTATIONS
"In this sense, the theory of" this group "may be summed up in the single sentence: abolition of private property"
Sunny
Gina
Evan
2nd place: $2,000
3rd place: $1,000
New champion: $28,801
Sunny
Gina
Evan

21 R
(including 1 DD),
2 W

(including 2 DDs),
